basics.name: Eric Roger Moseley
basics.label: Astrophysicist
basics.phone: five zero nine eight eight five seven four one four
basics.summary: Born in Rock Springs, WY, raised in Wenatchee, WA, my travels and studies have now taken me to Stanford University where I am a KIPAC Fellow. I am interested in particle dynamics in MHD fluids.

work.name: Kavli Institute for Particle Astrophysics and Cosmology (KIPAC), Stanford University/SLAC
work.summary: I am located in the Physics and Astrophysics building. Unfortunately, I don't have a window.

publications.name: Zur Elektrody/namik bewegter Körper
publications.summary: It concerned an interpretation of the Michelson–Morley experiment and the properties of light and time. Special relativity incorporates the principle that the speed of light is the same for all inertial observers regardless of the state of motion of the source.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
